name: DCAMU
description: An interconnected timeline of DC's animated movies that began with 'The Flashpoint Paradox' and concluded with 'Apokolips War'.

media.name: The Death and Return of Superman
media.timeline_note: This represents the two-part story told in 'The Death of Superman' (2018) and 'Reign of the Supermen' (2019).

media.name: Constantine: City of Demons
media.timeline_note: This movie's events occur concurrently with the 'Death of Superman' storyline.

media.name: Wonder Woman: Bloodlines
media.timeline_note: While released later, the majority of this film consists of flashbacks that take place before 'Justice League: War', with the present-day scenes happening after 'Reign of the Supermen'.

media.name: Constantine: The House of Mystery
media.timeline_note: This film serves as an epilogue to the DCAMU, directly following the events of 'Apokolips War'.

relationships.reason: The Tomorrowverse is the rebooted animated universe that began after the events of 'Justice League Dark: Apokolips War'.
